name: application
description: Deploys and configures a variety of applications defined from databag 'apps'

recipes.application: Loads application databags and selects recipes to use
recipes.application::passenger-nginx: Installs Ruby Enterprise with Passenger under Nginx
recipes.application::passenger_apache2: Sets up a deployed Rails application as a Passenger virtual host in Apache2
recipes.application::rails: Deploys a Rails application specified in a data bag with the deploy_revision resource
recipes.application::rails_nginx_ree_passenger: Deprecated recipe that deployed a rails application under Ruby Enterprise Edition, Passenger and Nginx
recipes.application::unicorn: Sets up the deployed Rails application with Unicorn as the web server
